sentences.input: generate a webserver named jim and handler named jill
sentences.output: This command creates a web server named jim and sets up a handler named jill to manage requests.
This command initializes a new database specifically for accounting records.

sentences.input: generate a rest api named userapi
sentences.output: This command scaffolds a RESTful API for user-related operations, named userapi.

sentences.output: This command generates the basic file structure and code for a React component named user.

sentences.input: add a new route to the webserver
sentences.output: This command configures a new URL path or endpoint within the existing web server.

sentences.input: delete the user table from the database
sentences.output: This command removes the user table and its data from the specified database.

sentences.input: update the handler to return JSON
sentences.output: This command modifies an existing handler to format its responses as JSON.
This command displays a list of all accessible Application Programming Interfaces.
This command stops and then starts the web server, applying any new configurations.
This command publishes the application to the live production environment, making it accessible to users.

This command establishes a new database designated for managing order information.
